author: gertv
msg: CAMEL-876: part 1 -- return a Scanner/Iterator from the Expression instead of the entire List at once

author: sandygao
msg: When ID/IDREF/ENTITY rules are checked against a list value, we temporarily hijack the ValidatedInfo object for the list value and use it for individual items in the list. We then restore it back to the original state.
This doesn't work when one of the items is invalid and an exception is thrown, because the ValidatedInfo would contain information for the bad item, as opposed to the list.
Fixed by adding a try-finally block to always restore the ValidatedInfo to the "list value" sate.
